highlights: Conceptualized and developed web applications using ReactJS, propelling a 30% surge in user engagement for 2,000+ users.

Proficient in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React, Redux, React Router, advanced JavaScript (ES6+), and TypeScript.
Implemented performance optimizations, code-splitting techniques, and utilized modern front-end build tools like Webpack and Babel.
Experienced in state management, component lifecycle in React, responsive web design, and basic knowledge of Python and Java.
Crafted responsive and interactive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular libraries like React.
Seamlessly integrated RESTful APIs to enhance the functionality and interactivity of web applications.
